featured.text: Glenn, who retires from the U.S. Senate next month, joins a list of individuals and sports teams honored with more than one ticker-tape parade.
He explained that he had just retired and was happiest when he could see or hear boys playing his 32 game, cricket.

definition.zh_def: 退休，停止工作或職業生涯，通常因年齡或健康原因。
definition.en_def: To stop working, usually due to reaching a certain age or for health reasons.
definition.example: She plans to retire next year after working for over thirty years.
